import React from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {createStructuredSelector} from 'reselect' import CustomButton from '../custom-button/cutom-button.component' import StripeCheckoutButton from '../stripe-button/stripe-button.component' import './checkout-summary.styles.scss' import {selectCartSubtotal, selectCartTotal, selectCartTaxes } from '../../redux/cart/cart.selectors' const CheckoutSummary = ({total, subtotal}) => { return (

Summary

Subtotal ${subtotal}
Estimated Delivery & Handling $0.00
Taxes {taxes}
Total ${total}
) } const mapStateToProps = createStructuredSelector({ subtotal: selectCartSubtotal, total: selectCartTotal, taxes: selectCartTaxes }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(CheckoutSummary)
